Name: Vehicle
Description: Vehicles used for transporting the deceased, such as hearses or vans.

Name: Chapel
Description: Chapel or funeral venue for services.

Name: Casket
Description: Caskets or coffins available for funerals.

Name: Flowers
Description: Floral arrangements and decorations for the funeral.

Name: Staff
Description: Funeral service staff including drivers, ushers, and coordinators.

Name: Grave Plot
Description: Grave plots reserved for burial services.
